lexUnit.name: construe.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: interpret in a particular way.

sentence.text: What one person would construe as simply permitting a sinner to dig his own pit , another would see as encouraging further sin .
Can we even construe Freudian theory as a nineteenth century articulation of these ideas about possession ?
If the parties had agreed that each consignment was to be separately paid for , the court will normally construe the contract as severable .

On the other hand , it is difficult to construe " " persons " " as meaning the majority of persons or the average reader .
